CustomField.formula: CASE(PaymentFrequency__c, "Semi-Annually", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 2, 2), "Semiannual", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 2, 2), "Semi-Annual", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 2, 2), "Tri-Annually", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 3, 2), "Quarterly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 4, 2), "Bi-Monthly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 6, 2), "Monthly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 12, 2), "Semi-Monthly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 24, 2), "Quad-Weekly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 13, 2), "Bi-Weekly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 26, 2), "Weekly", ROUND(TotalPremiumAmount__c * 52, 2), TotalPremiumAmount__c)
CustomField.label: Offer NAP
